09/21 // MOUNTING KITS AND ACCESSORIES // KITS ET ACCESSOIRES DE MONTAGE // MONTAGE-KITS UND ZUBEHÖR
Accuride reserve the right to alter specifications without notice / Accuride se reserve le droit de modifier les specifications sans preavis / Technische Anderungen vorbehalten
• Stainless steel bracket for
DS2028, DS2728, DS3031
and DS5321 slides
• Bottom & platform mounting
options
• Minimum 2 pairs required,
depending on slide length
• 3 or 4 pairs can be used per
pair of slides
• Customer supplies hardware
• Fixings depend on slide
selected
• Équerre en acier inoxydable
pour coulisses DS5321,
DS3031, DS2028, DS2728

5321
